actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act establishing the Gulf Islands National Seashore to increase the amount authorized for the acquisition of private property to be included in the seashore.

summary.text: Increases the amount authorized for the acquisition of private property for the Gulf Islands National Seashore in the States of Florida and Mississippi from $3,120,000 to $10,000,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act establishing the Gulf Islands National Seashore to increase the amount authorized for the acquisition of private property to be included in the seashore.
